channel.title: Raúl E. Taveras's Website
channel.description: Recent content on Raúl E. Taveras's Website

item.title: About me
item.author: raul@raultaveras.online (Raúl Ernesto Taveras Franco)
item.description: I am Raúl: Christian, linguistics lover, diplomacy professional, born in the Dominican Republic but citizen of the world. Thank you for stopping by!

item.title: Recommendations hub
item.author: raul@raultaveras.online (Raúl Ernesto Taveras Franco)
item.description: This is where you will find links to my recommended media and content. Podcasts I listen to [WIP]

item.title: Podcasts I Listen To
item.author: raul@raultaveras.online (Raúl Ernesto Taveras Franco)
item.description: For reference, I currently use the Android app Podcast Addict to listen to podcasts. Linguistics and Language A Way with Words Conlangery – For Constructing Languages Lexicon Valley New Books in Language That's What They Say The Allusionist The Endless Knot Words for Granted Wordy Wordpecker The History of English Lingthusiasm en clair: forensic linguistics, literary detection, language mysteries, and more History The History of Rome Podcast - The OG History Podcast.
